name: Classic Custard
description:
Simple, Sweet, Vanillay Custard. Wanted to make something that was shake and vape, while also a custard!

Give her a try. its tasty!
author: Sublimeice

reviews.text: A custard that's legit good off the shake. Yes!
I deleted my comment, apparently no criticism is allowed on this platform.

great custard dude, tastes good right off the rip.  I love custards, this is going to steep from very good to banging good.
I like to add .5 % Tahitian Vanilla Cream to custards, brightens them up and the aroma is amazing. Thanks for sharing this.
